title: Garden City - 2 bedroom, 1 bath
map_address: 28536 Krauter near N of Ford, East of Harrison
posting_body: ['Immaculate condition!', ' Updated single family home in great location with many recent updates including all new paint, new carpet / pad in both bedrooms & living room, light fixtures, handicapp height toilet, all new window blinds and more.', ' Large finished attic area for storage since home is on slab.', ' Huge fenced yard.', 'Home comes with 6 appliances (side by side refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, washer and dryer).', ' Baseboard hot water heat; bring your own window A/C units.', ' Ceramic in kitchen & bathroom.', ' Ready for move in August 1st on 12 month lease.', ' Lanlord requires GROSS household income from all sources to be $48,000 or higher to qualify.', ' Security Deposit = to 1.5 x monthly rent.', ' LL to run criminal background before signing lease.', " Move in monies consist of first month's rent, $1,800 Security Deposit and $400 cleaning fee.", "Pets considered on a case by case basis with non refundable pet fee and add'l rent per month."]
